name: get_stock_price
description: Gets the latest stock price given the ticker symbol of a company.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for a company (for example AAPL for Apple).

name: calculate_SMA
description: Calculate the simple moving average for a given stock ticker and a window.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for a company (for example AAPL for Apple).

window.description: The timeframe to consider when calculating the SMA

name: calculate_EMA
description: Calculate the exponential moving average for a given stock ticker and a window.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for a company (for example AAPL for Apple).

window.description: The timeframe to consider when calculating the EMA

name: calculate_RSI
description: Calculate the RSI for a given stock ticker.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for a company (for example AAPL for Apple).

name: calculate_MACD
description: Calculate the MACD for a given stock ticker.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for a company (for example AAPL for Apple).

name: plot_stock_price
description: Plot the stock price over past 12 months given the ticker symbol of a company

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for a company (for example AAPL for Apple).

name: compare_stock_prices
description: Compare the stock prices of two companies over a specified period.

ticker1.description: The stock ticker symbol for the first company.

ticker2.description: The stock ticker symbol for the second company.

period.description: The period for which to compare the stock prices (e.g., '3mo' for 3 months).

name: average_volume
description: Calculate the average trading volume for a given stock over a specified period.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for a company (for example AAPL for Apple).

period.description: The period for which to calculate the average volume (e.g., '3mo' for 3 months).

name: get_dividend_info
description: Get dividend information for a given stock.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for a company (for example AAPL for Apple).

name: get_stock_news
description: Get recent news headlines for a given stock.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for a company (for example AAPL for Apple).

num_articles.description: The number of news articles to retrieve.

name: calculate_daily_returns
description: Calculate the daily returns for a given stock over the last month.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for a company (for example AAPL for Apple).
